doc:
Percy Herbert (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percy_Herbert_(actor) 0 Percy Herbert (31 July 1920 – 6 December 1992) was an English actor. He worked predominantly from the 1950s into the 1970s and became one of the most recognisable faces in post-war British cinema. Percy_Herbert ( 31_July_1920 – 6_December_1992 ) was an_English_actor . He worked predominantly from the_1950s into the_1970s and became one of the_most_recognisable_faces in post-war_British_cinema .
